title: I just got a Pixel 3A XL, did the update to Android 10, but I cannot use eSim. No + carrier option.
content:
Hello, My pixel 3A XL does not display any eSim option after the Android 10 update. I cannot add carrier or anything. Is there anything particular to do to activate theses options?

Thanks.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
